Constructor Detail

ZayatzModel

public ZayatzModel(double Pi,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> eqClasses)
Zayatz model, based on Zayatz, 1991

Parameters:
pi - sampling fraction
eqClasses - Map containing the equivalence class sizes (as keys) of the data set and the corresponding frequency (as values) e.g. if the key 2 has value 3 then there are 3 equivalence classes of size two.
Method Detail

computeUniquenessTotal

public double computeUniquenessTotal()
Specified by:
computeUniquenessTotal in class UniquenessModel
Returns:
Population Uniqueness estimate as total number of individuals in a population

computeRisk

public double computeRisk()
Description copied from class: PopulationModel
computes the re-identification risk on a file level for a given data set and a given measurement scenario (population unique vs. equivalence class based)

Specified by:
computeRisk in class PopulationModel
Returns:
A single number representing the disclosure risk on a file level, depending on the model this estimate is based on population uniqueness or equivalence class size and frequency

computeConditionalUniquenessPercentage

public double computeConditionalUniquenessPercentage()
Returns:
estimate of the the probability that an equivalence class of size 1 in the sample was chosen from an equivalence class of size 1 in the population

computeConditionalUniquenessTotal

public double computeConditionalUniquenessTotal()
Returns:
estimate of the total number of sample uniques that are also population uniques
